title: Emerald & Polki Diamond Y-Haaram: A Symphony of Tradition and Elegance
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish; Natural Emeralds (approx. 30 carats total weight) with excellent color saturation; Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds) of VS clarity
expertly set in a closed setting.
features: This exquisitely crafted Y-Haaram features alternating oval-cut Emeralds and Polki Diamonds, each set within a delicate halo of brilliant-cut diamonds. The Y-drop showcases graduated Emerald and Polki Diamond elements, culminating in a larger oval Emerald centerpiece. The closed setting of the Polki diamonds highlights their natural beauty and brilliance. The design blends the traditional charm of Polki with a modern, minimalist aesthetic.
colors: and warm yellow gold create a rich and harmonious color palette.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale events and contemporary festive occasions. Adds a touch of regal elegance to any ensemble.
description: This Haaram is a timeless investment, combining the traditional appeal of Polki diamonds with the allure of vibrant Emeralds. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, while the exquisite craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and durability. A statement piece that reflects refined taste and cultural appreciation.
